name: @deltares/fews-pi-archive-requests
description: Library for making archive requests to the FEWS PI webservice

scripts.json2ts: curl https://fewsdocs.deltares.nl/webservices/rest-api/v1/schemas/pirest/pi_rest_archive_areas.json | json2ts > src/data/ArchiveAreasResponse.ts & curl https://fewsdocs.deltares.nl/webservices/rest-api/v1/schemas/pirest/pi_rest_archive_attributes.json | json2ts > src/data/ArchiveAttributesResponse.ts & curl https://fewsdocs.deltares.nl/webservices/rest-api/v1/schemas/pirest/pi_rest_archive_externalnetcdfstorageforecasts.json | json2ts > src/data/ArchiveExternalNetCdfStorageForecastsResponse.ts & curl https://fewsdocs.deltares.nl/webservices/rest-api/v1/schemas/pirest/pi_rest_archive_locations.json | json2ts > src/data/ArchiveLocationsResponse.ts & curl https://fewsdocs.deltares.nl/webservices/rest-api/v1/schemas/pirest/pi_rest_archive_parameters.json | json2ts > src/data/ArchiveParametersResponse.ts & curl https://fewsdocs.deltares.nl/webservices/rest-api/v1/schemas/pirest/pi_rest_archive_productsmetadata.json | json2ts > src/data/ArchiveProductsMetaDataResponse.ts & curl https://fewsdocs.deltares.nl/webservices/rest-api/v1/schemas/pirest/pi_rest_archive_sources.json | json2ts > src/data/ArchiveSourcesResponse.ts
